page.title: 04WHY LIVE IN BRIDGE OF WEIR ?
page.content: People choose to live in Bridge of Weir for various reasons.Some have lived here all their lives. Bridge of Weir is situated in the country and it is not too far away from the city of{Glasgow}and the peaceful{Clyde coast.} People decide to live in Bridge of Weir because there are lots of amenities and it has a quiet relaxing atmosphere which offers a marked contrast to the hustle and bustle of Glasgow. For people interested in sport there is a variety of{sports clubs}to suit all ages. For those who have a need to travel {Glasgow airport}is only quarter of an hour away.
